meanings.definition: Provided with a reward or gift
meanings.sent1: The bountied treasure chest was full of gold coins.
meanings.sent2: The bountied present made her smile with joy.
meanings.sent3: The bountied surprise party was a huge success.
meanings.sent4: Her bountied efforts in the competition paid off.
meanings.sent5: The bountied scholarship helped him pursue his dreams.

meanings.definition: Having a bounty or reward offered
meanings.sent1: The bountied poster displayed the reward for the lost dog.
meanings.sent2: The bountied mission attracted many brave adventurers.
meanings.sent3: The bountied race for the finish line was intense.
meanings.sent4: The bountied challenge motivated everyone to participate.
meanings.sent5: The bountied contest prize was a luxurious vacation.

meanings.definition: To offer a reward for something
meanings.sent1: He bountied the missing cat poster around the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The king bountied a reward for the capture of the bandits.
meanings.sent3: She bountied a prize for the best Halloween costume.
meanings.sent4: The company bountied a bonus for exceptional performance.
meanings.sent5: They bountied a cash reward for any information leading to the stolen car.
